creditline: Gift of the Dr. Ira and Maureen Adelman Collection
description: glass with bubbles throughout with exterior relief design in brown of a figure with a deer with a basket on its back on one side and three animals, cloud, and rock on opposite side; pair of faux handles on shoulder; spoon attached to stopper with a dark orange gemstone with white lines on top
title: Snuff bottle with figure and animals
